resources.string: Don\'t have an account?Sign up now
Enter your registered mobile number and email below:
Q1.How will the training be delivered?

A.1 You will be taught using pre-recodred videos and text tutorials. The training has quizzes, assignments, and tests to help you learn better. At the end of the traning,you will attempt a project to get hands-on practice of what you learn during your traning.
Q.2What will be the timings of the training?

A.2 As this is a purely online traning program, you can choose to learn at any time of the day. We will recommend a pace to be followed throughout the program, but the actual timings and learning hours can be decided by students according to their convenence.
Q.3What is the duration of training?
Q.4How much time should I spend everyday?
A.4We recommend spending 10-12 hours per week.However,the actual learning hours can be decided by you as per your convenience.
Q.5When can I start my traning?
A.5You can choose your prefeered batch date while signing up for the training program.
Q.6When will I get the certificate?
A.6You will be able to download the certificate once you complete your training and take the final test.
